Su negocio es heredado de generación en generación y consiste en la cría y engorde de ganado vacuno para el comercio de leche, carne, cuero, etc., él se ocupa de administrar el establo y realizar visitas a las ferias ganaderas lugareñas y encontrar terneros para la cría y engorde, una vez que el ganado ya ha crecido lo vende de diferentes maneras; vende leche, también carne, cuero y otros. “conozco el negocio desde que soy niño, toda mi vida me ocupe de la granja y ahora necesito terneros para criarlos…” comenta. Su sueño es tener un establo grande y completo, él desea ampliar su negocio mediante la compra de terneros vacunos para criarlos y engordarlos. Esta es la 2 secuencia de préstamos con la empresa en 3 años que se dedica a esta actividad de forma independiente. 
Es por esos motivos que Marcelo solicita un préstamo para la compra de terneros para criarlos, engordarlos y con los beneficios cubrir los gastos de sus padres.
texts.en:
Marcelo is a 24 year-old man who is single and has no children.  He has a business raising livestock.

He is developing his business in the community of Tacanoca, located on the banks of the sacred Lake Titicaca, at 3850 meters above sea level.  The residents of this area earn a living by farming and fishing.  The climate here is cold and dry, with a daytime temperature that varies between 1 and 12 degrees centigrade.  

Marcelo has a dark complexion, short black hair, dark eyes, a short stature, and a slim build.  His native language is Aymara, and he also speaks Spanish in his daily life and in his business. He shares his life with his parents, who are elderly and do not work.  They live in their own home, built of adobe with a tin roof.  The home has electricity and potable water.  

Marcelo inherited his business through generations of family members.  The business involves raising cattle to sell milk, meat, leather, etc.  He is responsible for managing the cowshed and making visits to the various livestock fairs in the area.  He must also find calves for breeding and fattening.  Once the cattle have grown, he sells them in various ways.  He sells the milk, as well as the meat, hide, and other products.  "I've known this business since I was a child; I've been taking care of the farm my whole life, and now I need calves to raise," he comments.  His dream is to have a large and full cowshed.  He wants to expand his business by buying calves to raise and fatten.  This is the 2nd loan cycle with the business that he has taken in the 3 years since he started working independently.  This is why Marcelo is requesting a loan to buy calves to raise and fatten.  With the profits from this investment, he will cover the expenses of his parents.

loans.use: to buy calves to raise and breed

loans.name: Pivas Group

texts.es:
Ana es una mujer de 25 años de edad, soltera, tiene un hijo de 5 años, y su negocio es la manicura.
Ella es buena madre, emprendedora, de buen trato, comunicativa, responsable y trabajadora. Su negocio lo desarrolla en el barrio ‘plan 3000’ caracterizado por su producción en manufactura, donde microempresarios en todas las áreas, como la confección, el diseño y el arte, reproducen productos extranjeros que se comercializan en los mercados del lugar, es el barrio más poblado de la ciudad, de clima cálido tropical con una temperatura que varía durante el día entre 18-35 grados centígrados.
Ana es de tez morena, cabello negro largo lo usa amarrado, ojos pardos, baja estatura, complexión física robusta, su lengua materna es el Guaraní que habla en familia y habla español por cultura general y por el comercio que realiza (al centro usa blusa rayada horizontalmente con negro y blanco). Su vida la realiza en compañía de su hijo que está comenzando la escuela, viven en un cuarto alquilado construido de ladrillo y cemento y cuenta con agua potable, energía eléctrica y alcantarillado. Las ganas de darle a su hijo un mejor futuro la llevó a liderar una banca de personas con negocios como; venta de fideo, venta de helados, venta de artículos escolares, horneado de masitas, venta de pollo, venta de artículos de limpieza, venta de toallas, fotocopiadora y mototaxi, para solicitar un préstamo y cumplir sus sueños. Ella trabaja como manicurista y se encarga del cuidado y embellecimiento de las manos y en especial de las uñas. Su trabajo lo realiza en horario del día, eso la dificulta cuidar a su hijo. Su trabajo lo realiza en un centro de estética; son sus ocupaciones el corte, limpieza y pulido de las uñas tanto de las manos como de los pies. Primero retira la pintura anterior utilizando acetona. Luego, corta y perfila la forma de las uñas utilizando limas. Para ablandar las cutículas se ayuda de agua y aceite y para limpiarlas de asperezas y recortarlas utiliza cuchillos y tijeras especiales. “trabajo sin descanso durante toda la semana, necesito independizarme para poder cuidar a mi hijo…” comenta. Su sueño es abrir un salón de belleza con todos los servicios, ella desea independizarse y abrir un salón de belleza comprando, sillas de peluquera, equipo de manicura y otros muebles necesarios. Esta es la 3 secuencia de préstamos con la institución en 6 años que viene desarrollando esta actividad.
Es por esos motivos que Ana solicita un préstamo para la compra de muebles y equipo de peluquería para independizarse y administrar su propio negocio.
texts.en:
Ana is a 25 year old single women who has a 5 year old child. Her business is manicures. She is a good mother, enterprising, well-mannered, communicative, responsible and hard-working. Her business takes place on the Plan 3000 neighborhood which is known for it's manufacturing, where enterprises from all fields like sewing, design, art, reproduction of foreign goods sell in the local markets. It has the highest population in the city. It's climate is hot and tropical with a temperature that varies during the day between 18 and 35 degrees Celsius.

Ana is dark-skinned with long black tied back hair, black eyes, short and robust in build. Her native language is Guaraní which she speaks in her family and she speaks Spanish because of the general culture and for her work (She is in the center wearing a black and white striped blouse). She lives with her son who has started school. They live in a rented house made of brick and cement with running water, electricity and sewage.

The desire to provide her son a better future led her to head a group of people with businesses like selling noodles, ice-cream sales, the sale of school supplies, baking pasties, selling chicken, the sale of cleaning supplies, selling towels, photocopies and a taxi to request a loan and fulfil their dreams.

She works as a manicurist and takes charge of the care and maintenance of hands and especially nails. She works during the day which makes it difficult to care for her son. Her work takes place in a beauty salon and consists of cutting, cleaning and polishing nails both on hands and feet. First she uses acetone to remove the polish, then she cuts and shapes the nail using files. She uses water to soften the nails and oil to get rid of roughness. She cuts then using special knives and scissors. “I work without a break the whole week. I need to go out on my own to be able to care for my son”, she commented.

Her dream is to open a full service beauty salon. She wants to be independent and open a beauty shop buying hair cutting chairs, manicure equipment and other necessary furniture. This is her 3rd loan with the institution in the 6 years she has done this business. For these reasons Ana is requesting a loan to buy furniture and hair salon equipment to go independent and manage her own business.

loans.use: to buy furniture and hair salon equipment to go independent and manage her own business.

loans.name: Mario

texts.es:
Mario es un hombre de 29 años de edad, soltero, tiene un hijo de 5 años de edad, y su negocio es la compra y venta de ganado.
Él es buen padre, emprendedor, paciente, comprensivo, responsable y trabajador, su negocio lo desarrolla en la comunidad ‘Palcoco’ situada a orillas del lago sagrado Titicaca y ubicada aproximadamente a 30 kilómetros de la ciudad, y a una altura aproximada de 3930 metros sobre el nivel del mar, de clima frío y seco con una temperatura que varía durante el día entre 0-12 grados centígrados.
Mario es de tez morena, cabello negro corto, ojos pardos, baja estatura, complexión física delgada, su lengua materna es el Aymará que se habla en el lugar y habla español por cultura general y por el comercio que realiza. Su vida la realiza en compañía de su hijo que  está comenzando la escuela, viven en una casa propia construida de adobe con techo de calamina que cuenta con electricidad y agua de pozo. Su negocio es la cría y engorde de ganado vacuno para el comercio de leche; su labor consiste en visitar las ferias ganaderas del lugar y comprar ganado lechero para la cría y engorde. Se ocupa de las vacunas, del cuidado, de la comida y cuando el ganado ya ha crecido lo oferta a productores queseros; vende leche, “compro totora, alquilo campos para sembrar alfalfa y me ocupo de que pasteen casi todo el día, para que produzcan la mayor cantidad de leche posible…” comenta. Su sueño es construir una casa de ladrillo y cemento, él desea aumentar su producción lechera mediante la compra de terneros lecheros para criarlos y engordarlos. Esta es la primera secuencia de préstamos con la empresa en 9 años que desarrolla esta actividad independientemente. 
Es por esos motivos que Mario solicita un préstamo para la compra de ganado lechero, alquiler de pastizales para criar y engordar a futuras vacas lecheras y construir su casa de ladrillo.
texts.en:
Mario is a 29 year old man, is single, and has a 5-year-old son. His business involves purchasing and selling cattle. He is a good father and an enterprising, patient, understanding, responsible, and hardworking man. He started his business in the Palcoco community, which is located on the shores of the sacred Lake Titicaca about 30 kilometers from the city and 3930 meters above sea level. The climate is cold and dry, with a temperature that varies from 0-12 degrees Celsius throughout the day. 

Mario is dark-skinned, has short black hair and brown eyes, and is short-statured and slim. His native language is Aymara, which he speaks at home. He speaks Spanish in the community and for commercial purposes. He lives with his son, who is starting school. They live in their own home, which is made of adobe and has a metal roof, electricity, and well water. 

He raises and fattens dairy cattle for a living. He attends cattle exhibitions and purchases dairy cattle in order to raise and fatten them. He works with the cattle in his care and feeds them, so that he can sell the milk to cheese producers. He purchases totora reeds, rents fields to grow alfalfa, and ensures that the cattle eat every day so that they will produce the largest amount of milk possible.

His dream is to build a home made of brick and cement. He hopes to increase milk production by purchasing young dairy cattle to raise and fatten. This is his second loan in the 9 years since he started the business. For the reasons above, Mario is requesting a loan to purchase dairy cattle, rent pastures to raise and fatten dairy cattle, and build a brick home.

loans.use: to purchase dairy cattle, rent pastures to raise and fatten the dairy cattle, and build a brick home.

texts.ru:

Вместе они живут в доме который сами для себя построили. Муаззам работает медсестрой в сельской больнице. Её муж  имеет высшее медицинское образование и имеет 12 лет стажа работы. Он по профессии  врач психолог. 
Муаззам обратилась в Арванд за кредитом для оплаты обучения своего внука. Заранее благодарит за поддержку и доверие. Спасибо Арванд.
texts.en: Muazzam is a 44-year-old woman. She is married and has three children. Muazzam and her spouse live together in perfect harmony. They take care of their children and live together in a house that they built for themselves. Muazzam is a nurse in a rural hospital. Her husband has a medical degree and twelve years of experience. He is a psychologist. Muazzam applied for a loan with Arvand to pay for her grandson's education. She thanks Arvand in advance for their support and trust.

loans.use: to pay for her grandson's education

loans.name: Sameria Betsaida

texts.es: SAMERIA BETSAIDA: Es una señora amable de 33 años de edad, originaria de Puerto Cabezas, pertenece a la etnia miskita, casada, tiene 3 hijos: El mayor de 14 años estudia su tercer año de secundaria, el de 8 años de edad cursa su segundo grado de primaria y un pequeño de 10 meses. Desde hace 13 años habita en una casa de familiares, la cual es compartida aproximadamente por 9 personas. Con el propósito de reducir el hacinamiento y brindarles una vivienda segura y cómoda a su familia, solicita financiamiento para comprar un terreno e iniciar a construir poco a poco su vivienda de tambo y madera. Ella y su marido sueñan con tener una casa de concreto, ya que es de mayor durabilidad y seguridad.
texts.en:
Sameria Betsaida, 33, is a kind woman. She is originally from Puerto Cabezas and belongs to the Miskita people. She is married and has three children. Her eldest child is fourteen years old and is in third grade of secondary school. The second child is eight and is in second grade of primary school. The youngest one is ten months old.

She has been living with some relatives for thirteen years. She has to share a house with eight more people. She wants her family to have more space and a safer home, so she is requesting a loan to buy a plot of land and start building, little by little, a wooden stilt home. She and her husband dream of having a concrete house, because they are more durable and safer.

loans.use: to buy a plot of land and start building a wooden stilt home.

texts.ru: Ширмо замужняя женщина в возрасте 58 лет. Она с семей проживает на районе Вахш, Хатлонской области. Муж Ширмо является мясником. Также с ними живут ее сын с женой. Сын работает таксистом, а его жена помогает Ширмо в работе. Она занимается продажей резаной моркови и чакка. Чакка-это таджикский домашний молочный продукт. Чакка как твердый йогурт без сахара. Ширмо хочет расширить деятельность и купить больше чакки для продажу. Она надеется таким образом увеличить доход и улучшить жизненные условия семьи.
texts.en: Shirmo is a 58-year old married woman. She lives with her family in the Vakhsh region  of the Khatlon district. Shirmo’s husband is a butcher. Shirmo’s son and his wife also live with them. Her son works as a taxi driver, and her daughter-in-law helps Shirmo in her work. Shirmo sells chopped carrots and “chaka,” a traditional Tajik homemade dairy product. Chaka is similar to a thick sour yogurt. Shirmo would like to expand her business and buy more chaka for sale. She hopes to increase her revenues and improve her family’s life conditions.

loans.use: to buy a traditional sour milk product and expand her business.
